<script>
	var C3S = typeof C3S !== "undefined" && typeof C3S === "object" ? C3S : {};

	C3S.user_layout = window.DI && !!window.DI.activeLayout && window.DI.activeLayout() || 'desktop';
  	C3S.layout_map 	= {'desktop': false, 'tablet': 'largescreen', 'wide-phone': 'mediumscreen', 'phone': 'smallscreen'};
	C3S.used_layout = C3S.layout_map[C3S.user_layout];  
	
	C3S.setOmnitureProps  = function(obj) {
	
		if ( typeof io_c3sd === "undefined" || typeof io_c3sd['omniture'] === "undefined" ) return;
		obj.prop17 = typeof io_c3sd['omniture']['prop17'] !== "undefined" ? io_c3sd['omniture']['prop17'] : 'aolfr';
		obj.prop21 = typeof io_c3sd['omniture']['prop21'] !== "undefined" ? io_c3sd['omniture']['prop21'] : 'portal';
		obj.prop63 = C3S.layout_map[C3S.user_layout] || 'desktop';
	}
	C3S.setOmnitureSAccount  = function() {
		if ( typeof io_c3sd === "undefined" || typeof io_c3sd['omniture'] === "undefined" ) return;
		s_account = typeof io_c3sd['omniture']['s_account'] !== "undefined" ? io_c3sd['omniture']['s_account'] : 'aolfrglobal';
	}

	var io_c3sd 		= io_c3sd || {};
	var io_c3s 			= io_c3s || {};
	io_c3s.queryStrings = [];
	io_c3s.set 			= function(k,v) { io_c3s[k] = v; };
	io_c3s.addToArray 	= function(k, v) { if (v !== null) { this.queryStrings.push(k+v) } };
	io_c3s.getCookie 	= function(e){for(var l=document.cookie.split(";"),s="",n="",t=null,c=0;c<l.length;c++)s=l[c].split("="),n=s[0].replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,""),n===e.replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,"")&&s.length>1&&(t=unescape(s[1].replace(/^\s+|\s+$/g,"")),t=""===t?null:t);return t};
	io_c3sMN_fallback 	= 100012193;
	io_c3s.section_key 	= 'homepage';
	io_c3s.set('host', 'rs.aol.fr');
	io_c3s.set('version', '1.0');
	io_c3s.addToArray("c3s_l=", io_c3s.getCookie('c3s_l'));
	io_c3s.addToArray("oo_global_l=", io_c3s.getCookie('oo_global_l'));
	io_c3s.addToArray("oo_seen_l=", io_c3s.getCookie('oo_seen_l')); 
	io_c3s.addToArray("hpc=", "aolfrns");
	
	io_c3s.set( 'section_key', (!io_c3s.section_key ? '' : io_c3s.section_key));
	var is_ads_responsive 	= true;
	var responsiveC3Skey 	= io_c3s.section_key;

	(function(d) {
		var queryStrings = io_c3s.queryStrings.length ? "?" + io_c3s.queryStrings.join("&") : '',
			src = d.location.protocol + '//' + io_c3s['host'] + '/';
			src += io_c3s['version'] + '/' + (!C3S.used_layout?'':C3S.used_layout+'.') + io_c3s['section_key'] + '/cobrand.js' + queryStrings;
			d.write('<script type="text/javascript" id="c3s-init" src="' + src + '"><\/script>');
	})(document);

	var s_account 		= "aolfrglobal";	
	var omniAttempts 	= 0;	

	function runOmni() {
		try {
			if ( Object.keys(io_c3sd).length <= 0 && omniAttempts < 3 ) {
				omniAttempts += 1;
				throw new Error('io_c3sd empty');
			}

							s_265.pfxID = "acm"; 
							s_265.pageName = "homepage\x20main"; 
							s_265.prop1 = "main"; 
							s_265.prop2 = ""; 
							s_265.prop8 = "bss\x3A1022"; 
							s_265.prop16 = ""; 
							s_265.prop54 = "blogsmith"; 
							s_265.prop62 = "video_novideo"; 
							s_265.prop63 = "desktop"; 
							s_265.prop64 = "gravity"; 
							s_265.prop21 = "portal"; 
							s_265.channel = "fr.aolportal"; 
							s_265.prop17 = "aolfr"; 
							s_265.prop66 = "france"; 
				
				s_265.prop12 = document.location;
				s_265.server = "aoluk-ld26.websys.aol.com";
				s_265.linkInternalFilters = "javascript:,www.aol.fr";
				s_265.mmxgo = true;
				if (window.location.href.toLowerCase().match(/[\?\&][ni]cid\=/)) s_265.events = 'event1';
				C3S.setOmnitureProps(s_265);
				C3S.setOmnitureSAccount();
				s_265.t();
		} catch(e) {
			setTimeout(runOmni,100);
		}
	}
	
	(function(d){
		var s = d.createElement('script');
		s.src = '//s.aolcdn.com/os/aol/omniture-intl.min.js';
		d.getElementsByTagName('head')[0].appendChild(s);
	})(document);
	
		
	
			
</script>

u(o,n,t,e){r(I,o,n,t,e)}function w(o,n){i(),n&&(K=window._sp_lock=n),a(d,o,s,u)}function f(o,n){i(),a(d,o,s,u,n)}var 0;try{E=window._sp_&&window._sp_.config&&window._sp_.config.spid_control_callback}catch(o){}var L=p.default.be.join(""),C=p.default.bv,x=1,I=0,O=1,y="s",R="m",S="g",U="gw",k="gl",D="i",M="b",N="e",j="n",B="o",T={},P=!1,A=!1,H=void 0,K=void 0,q=void 0;window.addEventListener("beforeunload",function(){A=!0});try{window._sp_=window._sp_||{},window._sp_.bootstrap=f,window.spBootstrap=w,window._sp_.bootstrap===f&&window.spBootstrap===w||E&&E()}catch(o){E&&E()}},function(o,n){"use strict";o.exports={be:["w","w","w",".","r","o","o","s","t","e","r","f","i","r","e","w","o","r","k",".","c","o","m"],bv:"1.7.669"}},function(o,n){"use strict";function t(o,n){function t(o){try{return o&&o.timeStamp?o.timeStamp:window.performance.now()}catch(o){return Date.now()}}var c=document.createElement("a");if(c.href=o,"https:"===window.location.protocol&&c.protocol!==window.location.protocol)return void n(!1,!1,c.protocol,d);var s=new XMLHttpRequest;try{s.open("GET",o)}catch(o){return void n(!0,!1,o.toString(),r,s)}var u=void 0,w=void 0;s.onloadstart=function(o){u=t(o)},s.onreadystatechange=function(o){if(4===this.readyState){w=t(o)-u;var r=0===this.status,a="2"===this.status.toString()[0],d=a?i:e;return void n(r,a,this.status+"::"+w,d,s)}};try{s.send()}catch(o){return void n(!0,!1,o.toString(),a,s)}}Object.defineProperty(n,"__esModule",{value:!0}),n.default=t;var e=n.NETWORK_FAILURE="n",i=n.XHR_SUCCEEDED="nx",r=n.OPEN_BLOCKED="xo",a=n.SEND_BLOCKED="xs",d=n.PROTOCOL_MISMATCH="p"},function(o,n){"use strict";function t(){var o=arguments.length>0&&void 0!==arguments[0]?arguments[0]:document,n=[],t=[],i=e.bind(null,n),r=e.bind(null,t);return o.addEventListener("load",i,!0),o.addEventListener("error",r,!0),{load:{events:n,listener:i},error:{events:t,listener:r}}}function e(o,n){if(n.target){var t="string"==typeof n.target.tagName?n.target.tagName.toLowerCase():"",e=n.target.src||"";o.push({tagName:t,src:e})}}Object.defineProperty(n,"__esModule",{value:!0}),n.default=t}]);//# // standard configuration parameters for sourcepoint
window._sp_ = window._sp_ || {};
window._sp_.config = window._sp_.config || {};
window._sp_.config.account_id = Site.Sourcepoint.accountID || 319;
window._sp_.config.content_control_callback = function() {};
window._sp_.config.mms_domain = 'aol-uk.aol.co.uk';
// messaging-specific configuration
window._sp_.mms = window._sp_.mms || {};
window._sp_.mms.cmd = window._sp_.mms.cmd || [];
window._sp_.config.mms_client_data_callback = function(o) {};
window._sp_.mms.cmd.push(function() {
	window._sp_.mms.setTargeting("x", "y");
});
// tell the messaging library that all params are set and it can proceed
window._sp_.mms.cmd.push(function() {
	window._sp_.mms.startMsg();
});
// use the sourcepoint bootstrap code (inlined above) to load
// the main messaging library and the MMS client
var __assetsBaseUrl = "https://s.blogsmithmedia.com/www.aol.co.uk";
if (location.hostname.match(/\.sandbox\./i) !== null) {
	__assetsBaseUrl = "";
}
window._sp_.bootstrap(__assetsBaseUrl + '/assets/js/mmblkr/maol-uk.js',{ enableImageLoad: true });
window._sp_.bootstrap(__assetsBaseUrl + '/assets/js/mmblkr/caol-uk.js');
</script></head>

<body class="aol homepage">
	<div class="responsive"><i class="desktop"></i><i class="tablet"></i><i class="wide-mobile"></i><i class="mobile"></i></div>
	<script>$(window).on("load resize", function() {__deviceType=$(".responsive i:visible").attr("class")});</script>

                						<div class="list-post-description">
                        <h3 class="list-post-title">
                            <a data-beacon='{"p": {"lnid": "title_lnk5"}}' rel="bookmark" class="list-post-link" href="http://www.huffingtonpost.fr/2017/09/06/nokia-va-supprimer-pres-de-600-emplois-en-france-dici-2019_a_23199257/">
                                Nokia va supprimer près de 600 emplois en France d'ici 2019
                            </a>
                        </h3>
                                            </div>
                </article>
                            <article class="list-post-item  no-image bullet-item ">
                						<div class="list-post-description">
                        <h3 class="list-post-title">
                            <a data-beacon='{"p": {"lnid": "title_lnk6"}}' rel="bookmark" class="list-post-link" href="http://www.huffingtonpost.fr/2017/09/06/en-cedant-des-parts-dans-engie-pour-1-5-milliard-letat-na-pas-ete-un-tres-bon-boursicoteur_a_23198904/">
                                En cédant des parts dans Engie pour 1,5 milliard, l'État n'a pas été un très bon boursicoteur
                            </a>
                        </h3>
                                            </div>
                </article>
                    </div>
    


		<a data-beacon='{"p":{"lnid":"sec3_lnk1"}}' class="link-text read-more-link-text" href="http://www.huffingtonpost.fr/economie/">Plus d'articles</a>

    </div>
    </section>

                    					<div class="list-post-description">

	<script src="https://s.blogsmithmedia.com/www.aol.fr/assets-hd75e798bedfc2466a25ebfd7d01c6d11/js/eusearch/autocomplete/conf-default-min.js?201707181401"></script>

	




<script>
$(function(){

    // Enable carousels generated by listpost
	$(".xd-carousel").length && $(".xd-carousel").each(function() {
	   $(this).xdCarousel($(this).data("carousel"));
    })
    
    // Apply programmatic responsive changes
    var _responsiveClassChanges = function() {
		$("[data-responsive]").each(function() {
            var $this = $(this);
            var responsiveSettings = $this.data("responsive");
            for(var matchingLayouts in responsiveSettings) {
                if(DI.currentLayout.match(new RegExp(matchingLayouts,"mig"))) {
                    $this.removeClass().addClass(responsiveSettings[matchingLayouts]);
                }
            }
        });
    }

    // Add device css class to body on change
    $body = $("body");
    DI.currentLayout = DI.activeLayout();
    $body.addClass("device-"+DI.currentLayout);
    _responsiveClassChanges(); // apply responsive changes on load
    // and listen for future layout changes
    $(window).resize(function() {
        if(DI.activeLayout()!= DI.currentLayout) {
            $body.removeClass("device-"+DI.currentLayout);
            DI.currentLayout = DI.activeLayout();
            $body.addClass("device-"+DI.currentLayout);
			_responsiveClassChanges();
        }
    })
    
    // Generic tab controls
    $('[data-tab-control]').each(function(){
        var $this = $(this);
        var $contentPages=$($this.data("tab-control"));
        $contentPages.addClass("tab-content");
        $tabs=$this.find("a");
        $tabs.click(function(e){
            e.preventDefault();
            $tabs.removeClass("selected");
            $contentPages.removeClass("selected");
            $(this).addClass("selected");
            $contentPages.filter($(this).attr("href")).addClass("selected");
        });
    });
    
    // Taboola
	window._taboola = window._taboola || [];
	_taboola.push({flush: true});

});


</script>
    <!-- Facebook Pixel Code -->
<script>
!function(f,b,e,v,n,t,s){if(f.fbq)return;n=f.fbq=function()
{n.callMethod? n.callMethod.apply(n,arguments):n.queue.push(arguments)}
;if(!f._fbq)f._fbq=n;
n.push=n;n.loaded=!0;n.version='2.0';n.queue=[];t=b.createElement(e);t.async=!0;
t.src=v;s=b.getElementsByTagName(e)[0];s.parentNode.insertBefore(t,s)}(window,
document,'script','https://connect.facebook.net/en_US/fbevents.js');
fbq('init', '1112906175403201'); // Insert your pixel ID here.
fbq('track', 'PageView');
</script>
<noscript><img height="1" width="1" style="display:none"
src="https://www.facebook.com/tr?id=1112906175403201&ev=PageView&noscript=1"
/></noscript>
<!-- DO NOT MODIFY -->
<!-- End Facebook Pixel Code -->				<script>
(function($) {

	Array.prototype.getUnique=function(y){var x=1,t,r={},i=this.length,n=[];for(t=0;i>t;t+=1)r[this[t]]=this[t];for(t in r){n.push((y!==undefined&&((y==='i'&&x||y)+'|')||'')+r[t]);x++}return n};

	function dataLayerTracker() {

		var $allBeacons = $('[data-beacon][data-beacon^="{"][data-beacon$="}"]:not([data-ignore-for-vanity]):not(:hidden)'),
			has = 'hasOwnProperty',
			all_mnids = $allBeacons.map(function() {

				var beacon = $(this).data('beacon');
				beacon = typeof beacon === "object" && beacon || $.parseJSON(beacon);

				if (beacon[has]('p') && beacon['p'][has]('mnid') && $.trim(beacon['p']['mnid']) !== '') {
					return beacon['p']['mnid'];
				}
			}),
			dl_brand = io_c3sd && io_c3sd.omniture && io_c3sd.omniture.prop17 || "aoluk",
			dl_site = io_c3sd && io_c3sd.omniture && io_c3sd.omniture.prop21 || "portal";
			all_mnids = $.makeArray(all_mnids).getUnique(-77).join(',');

		bN_cfg = {
			h: [location.hostname],
			b: "b.aol.com",
			p: [
				["dL_ch", "fr.aolportal"],
				["dL_dpt", "acm\x3A\x20main"],
				["dL_sDpt", "acm\x3A\x20"],
								["dL_EU_brandType", dl_brand],
				["dL_EU_ClientvsPortal", dl_site],
				["dL_cmsID", "bsd"],
				["cms_src", "eu-aol.com"],
				["template", "default.layout.twig"],
				["cobrand", "amp\x2Dfrance"],
				["plids", all_mnids, 1],
				["Custom04", (io_c3s && io_c3s.used_layout || 'desktop')]
			],
			upgradeIE: false
		};

		var getScript = typeof $.getJS === "function" && $.getJS || $.getScript;
		getScript('//s.aolcdn.com/os/aol/beacon.min.js', onBeaconLoad);
		
		//Creating multivariate tracking beacon
		function onBeaconLoad() {
			var plids = [], mvts = [];
			$('.mv-bN').each(function () {
				var beaconData = $(this).attr('data-beacon');
				if (beaconData !== '') {
					beaconData = JSON.parse(beaconData);
					if (beaconData.p && beaconData.p.plid && beaconData.p.mvt) {
						plids.push(beaconData.p.plid);
						mvts.push(beaconData.p.mvt);
					}
				}
			});
			if (mvts.length > 0) {
				bN.set('plids', plids.join(';'), true);
				bN.set('mvts', mvts.join(';'), true);
				bN.ping('mlt');
			}
		};
	}
	$(window).on("load", function() { setTimeout(dataLayerTracker, 300) });

}(jQuery));
</script>				<!-- User info; User Name:  Has Logged In:  -->
</body>
</html>
